confirmStellarTransaction(bytes32,string.details: Confirms a Stellar transaction (called by bridge operator).

initiateFromStellar(bytes32,address,uint.details: Initiates an HTLC swap from Stellar to Ethereum.

params._amount: The amount of XLM to bridge.
params._ethereumAddress: The Ethereum address that will receive the funds.
params._hash: The SHA-256 hash of the preimage.
params._timelock: The time (in seconds) after which the swap can be refunded.
params.id: A unique identifier for the swap.

initiateToStellar(bytes32,string,bytes32.details: Initiates an HTLC swap from Ethereum to Stellar.

params._hash: The SHA-256 hash of the preimage.
params._stellarAddress: The Stellar account address that will receive the funds.
params._timelock: The time (in seconds) after which the swap can be refunded.
params.id: A unique identifier for the swap.

isValidHtlc(bytes32).details: Check if an HTLC exists and is valid.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

params._preimage: The secret preimage that hashes to the stored hash.
params.id: The ID of the swap to redeem.

refund(bytes32).details: Refunds an HTLC swap after the timelock has expired.

params.id: The ID of the swap to refund.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

params._newFee: The new bridge fee in wei.

updateStellarNetwork(string).details: Updates the Stellar network configuration (owner only).
